mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from XT_QJJL where ssid = #{ssid} and zt='3'

select qj.id, qj.xm, qj.dh,qj.bh, dm.dmmc as sjid,qj.xgsj, group_concat(ry.xm separator '|') as jjyxm, group_concat(ry.dh separator '|') as jjydh, group_concat(jl.clms separator '|') as clms from XT_QJJL qj left join XT_SSJL jl on qj.id = jl.qjid and jl.zt = '3' left join XT_JJRY ry on jl.ryid = ry.id and ry.zt = '1' left join XT_GYDM dm on dm.id = qj.sjid and dm.lbid = '5' where qj.zt = '3' and qj.ssid = #{ssid} group by qj.id, qj.xm, qj.dh,qj.bh, dm.dmmc,qj.xgsj order by qj.xgsj desc limit ${startPage}, ${page}
